title: The Complete Badger, Volume 1
description: Take a wild ride through comics stereotypes with the Badger This collection includes the first four issues from Capital Comics, as well as issues #5 and #6 as published by First Comics, all written by Mike Baron. What's more, Badger is coming back in November for an all new series, so catch up with the original series that same month - you'll never look at woodland creatures the same again
author: Mike Baron
